# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(GEOSX_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(GEOSX)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
GEOSXPluginInfo.C
GEOSXCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
GEOSXPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
GEOSXMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGEOSXFileFormat.C
GEOSXParser.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
GEOSXEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGEOSXFileFormat.C
GEOSXParser.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IGEOSXDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IGEOSXDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IGEOSXDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MGEOSXDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MGEOSXDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser vtkIOLegacy vtkIOXML vtkIOXMLParser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MGEOSXDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MGEOSXDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EGEOSXDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGEOSXDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser vtkIOLegacy vtkIOXML vtkIOXMLParser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EGEOSXDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGEOSXDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EGEOSXDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGEOSXDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par vtkIOLegacy vtkIOXML vtkIOXMLParser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EGEOSXDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGEOSXDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases GEOSX ${INSTALLTARGETS})
